text: Bajus is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 20 miles (32 km) northwest of Arras at the junction of the D86E and D86E1 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Vaast, dating from the eighteenth century. * The motte and moat of an old castle. * The eighteenth- century chateau. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bajus, Pas-de-Calais
